Detailed Description

The exponential cooling schedule cools the temperature T at every step according to the equation.

where is the cooling speed. The smaller is, the slower the cooling speed, and better the final result will be. Some literature uses instead. In practice, is very close to 1 and will be awkward to input (e.g. alpha = 0.999999 vs lambda = 1e-6).
